title: Java Level 9 — Advanced OOP & Exceptions
concept: Inheritance, interfaces, overriding, basic exception handling (still stdin/stdout based problems).

challenges.name: Shape Inheritance: Rectangle & Square
challenges.description: Create base class Shape with method double area(). Create Rectangle(width, height) extends Shape and overrides area(). Create Square(side) extends Rectangle using super. Read 'R w h' or 'S s' and print area with 2 decimals.
challenges.input_format: Single line: either 'R w h' or 'S s'.

challenges.name: Interface Payable
challenges.description: Define interface Payable with method double getPaymentAmount(). Implement classes Employee(salary) and Invoice(quantity, pricePerItem). Read type and values and print payment amount.
challenges.input_format: First word: type 'EMP' or 'INV'. For EMP: salary. For INV: quantity pricePerItem.

challenges.name: Bank Account with Overdraft Check
challenges.description: Extend earlier BankAccount: if withdraw amount > balance, do not change balance and print "INSUFFICIENT" before final balance. Otherwise withdraw. Print final balance.
challenges.output_format: Messages (if any) and final balance with 2 decimals.

challenges.name: Custom Exception: InvalidAgeException
challenges.description: Define custom checked exception InvalidAgeException. Read age; if age < 18 throw exception and catch it in main printing "INVALID AGE". Otherwise print "VALID".

challenges.name: Abstract Class Animal
challenges.description: Create abstract class Animal with abstract String sound(). Implement Dog and Cat classes. Read "dog" or "cat" and print their sound (e.g., "Woof" or "Meow").

challenges.name: Polymorphic Shape Array
challenges.description: Read n, then n lines each describing 'R w h' or 'S s' (Rectangle/Square). Store as Shape references, then print total area of all shapes.
challenges.input_format: n then n lines of shapes.

challenges.name: Comparable Student by Marks
challenges.description: Create class Student(name, marks) implementing Comparable<Student> sorted by marks desc, then name asc. Read n, then n students, sort and print them.
challenges.input_format: n, then n lines: name marks.

challenges.name: Try-Catch Divide by Zero
challenges.description: Read two integers a and b. Try to compute a/b. If division by zero occurs, catch exception and print "ERROR" instead of result.

challenges.name: Immutable Point Class
challenges.description: Create immutable class Point with final x,y and method distanceTo(Point other). Read x1,y1,x2,y2 and print Euclidean distance with 4 decimals.
challenges.input_format: Four doubles x1 y1 x2 y2.

challenges.name: Interface Shape3D (Volume)
challenges.description: Define interface Shape3D with method double volume(). Implement Cube(side) and Sphere(radius with π=3.14). Read type and size, print volume.
